command_template: { "aql": "select count(a/uid/value) as count from EHR[ehr_id/value=:ehrId] contains COMPOSITION a where a/archetype_details/archetype_id/value='openEHR-EHR-COMPOSITION.encounter.v1' or a/archetype_details/archetype_id/value='openEHR-EHR-COMPOSITION.journal_event_psky.v0'", "aqlParameters": { "ehrId": "#ehr" }	}

{ "aql": "select a/uid/value as id from EHR[ehr_id/value=:ehrId] contains COMPOSITION a where a/archetype_details/archetype_id/value='openEHR-EHR-COMPOSITION.encounter.v1' or a/archetype_details/archetype_id/value='openEHR-EHR-COMPOSITION.journal_event_psky.v0'", "aqlParameters": { "ehrId": "#ehr" }	}
